Reviews.Title: SVAT 4CH H.264 Configuration
Reviews.Author: Robert Jacobs
Reviews.Content: There were plenty of pages for setup and user instructions but I felt the directions were done by someone with English as a second language. Also, there were plenty of photos and some instruction but the instructions left a lot to the imagination if you are not an IT geek. There was no explanation when it came to technical terms, you either have to know it or make an assumption when trying to configure the system. Other than that it works fine and is doing what we wanted it to do.

ProductInfo.Features:
Anti-vandal mount; Easily connect to DVR with 65ft cables
Easy-to-use system functions just like a computer; View anytime, anywhere with remote viewing via internet, smartphone, and tablet
Receive email alerts, with photo, when motion is detected on your property; Record over 2 years' worth of footage on the included 500 GB hard drive
Choose motion-activated recording or H.264 compression to maximize storage space; 480TVL Hi-res cameras provide crisp and detailed video
24IR LEDs for 75ft automatic night vision; Weather-resistant camera housing provides superior functioning through all types of weather
ProductInfo.Name: SVAT 4CH H.264 500GB Smart Security DVR with 4 x 480TVL 75ft Night Vision Indoor/Outdoor Cameras (11020)
